0: However one of the nights of my stay dinner was quite busy and the waitstaf and kitchen were simply overwhelmed
There was not continental breakfast included with room and they were out of coffee also no chocolate on pilow not essential but would be nice touch
I was given the keys to my 2 reserved rooms with no explanation about any breakfast Diamond perks or anything else eg water or rooms on the Hilton Honors floor
There was a cooked breakfast option for 1750 and a continental breakfast option for 15
The in room dining menu had some reasonable priced options 12 for a 12 inch chese pizza all day kids menu for 8 burger fries and a drink In room breakfast dining was more expensive
My only complaint was minor the cost for breakfast
Arrived at 9 pm and restaurant Forbes was closed for dining already
Fairly big hotel restaurant is not recommended bar little bit better
For those inclined there is a pool a gym and a restaurant which has a decent looking menu we did not eat here
1: And at the end of the day the Hilton bar was staffed by an amazing lady
Plenty of restaurants to check out
the staff at reception and at the breakfast were very friendly and helpful
The breakfast was delicious and the fact that parking was included was a huge bonus
Kery carie provided us with two rooms free of charge with a refund from the previous room and a generous gift card for dinner
The restaurant makes the whole place smell amazing
Staff recommended and provided shuttle service to an exceptional restaurant
The redeeming quality was the restaurant the wait staff was friendly and the food was great
